level.heading: Eligibility of the uninsured.
level.text: To be eligible, an individual shall:
Be a resident of the District;
Have a household income that is not more than 350% of the federal poverty level; and
Not be enrolled in any public or private medical insurance program.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-164
level.text: For Law 15-164, see notes following ยง 48-831.01.
